com.gwtplatform.mvp.client.googleanalytics
Class GoogleAnalyticsImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.gwtplatform.mvp.client.googleanalytics.GoogleAnalyticsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GoogleAnalytics
public class GoogleAnalyticsImpl
extends Object
implements GoogleAnalytics

Default GoogleAnalytics implementation that uses JSNI to expose Google Analytics javascript methods.

Author:
Christian Goudreau

Method Detail

init

public void init(String userAccount)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Initializes the script for Google Analytics for a specific userAccount.

Specified by:
init in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
userAccount - The Google Analytics account. (i.e. UA-12345678-1)

addAccount

public void addAccount(String trackerName,
                       String userAccount)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Given that you already have initialized your default Google account with GoogleAnalytics.init(String), this function will add a new account on which you'll be able to track events and pages.

Specified by:
addAccount in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
trackerName - A user-defined tracker name.
userAccount - The Google Analytics account. (i.e. UA-12345678-1)

trackPageview

public void trackPageview(String pageName)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks a page given a specific page name.

Specified by:
trackPageview in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
pageName - The page name to track.

trackPageview

Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks the root of your application.

Specified by:
trackPageview in interface GoogleAnalytics

trackPageview

public void trackPageview(String trackerName,
                          String pageName)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks a page given a specific page name on a user defined tracker name. See GoogleAnalytics.addAccount(String, String).

Specified by:
trackPageview in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
trackerName - A user defined tracker name.
pageName - The page name to track.

trackEvent

public void trackEvent(String category,
                       String action)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics.

Specified by:
trackEvent in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.

trackEvent

public void trackEvent(String category,
                       String action,
                       String optLabel)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics, attaching a label and value.

Specified by:
trackEvent in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.
optLabel - An string to provide additional dimensions to the event data.

trackEvent

public void trackEvent(String category,
                       String action,
                       String optLabel,
                       int optValue)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics, attaching a label and value.

Specified by:
trackEvent in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.
optLabel - An string to provide additional dimensions to the event data.
optValue - An integer that you can use to provide numerical data about the user event.

trackEvent

public void trackEvent(String category,
                       String action,
                       String optLabel,
                       int optValue,
                       boolean optNonInteraction)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics, attaching a label and value.

Specified by:
trackEvent in interface GoogleAnalytics
Parameters:
category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.
optLabel - An string to provide additional dimensions to the event data.
optValue - An integer that you can use to provide numerical data about the user event.
optNonInteraction - A boolean that when set to true, indicates that the event hit will not be used in bounce-rate calculation.

trackEventWithTracker

                                  String category,
                                  String action)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics on a user defined tracker name. See GoogleAnalytics.addAccount(String, String).

category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.

trackEventWithTracker

public void trackEventWithTracker(String trackerName,
                                  String category,
                                  String action,
                                  String optLabel,
                                  int optValue,
                                  boolean optNonInteraction)
Description copied from interface: GoogleAnalytics
Tracks an event in Google analytics, attaching a label and value on a user defined tracker name. See GoogleAnalytics.addAccount(String, String).

Specified by:
trackEventWithTracker in interface GoogleAnalytics
category - The name you supply for the group of objects you want to track.
action - A string that is uniquely paired with each category, and commonly used to define the type of user interaction for the web object.
optLabel - An string to provide additional dimensions to the event data.
optValue - An integer that you can use to provide numerical data about the user event.
optNonInteraction - A boolean that when set to true, indicates that the event hit will not be used in bounce-rate calculation.
